resources.string: The app aims to promote the genuine adoption of financial literacy knowledge taught in schools during Education & Career Guidance modules.

Even though students are exposed to basic financial literacy concepts such as “Budgeting”, youths do not put it into practice as the modules only provide theoretical knowledge, not practical knowledge.

LearnLoop aims to provide the practical knowledge aspect through features such as:
 ⚪ Setting Budgets
 ⚪ Budgeting
 ⚪ Expenditure Tracker
 ⚪ Financial Literacy Courses
 ⚪ Student Discount Library
Citi Foundation-SMU Financial Literacy Program for Young Adults
Sim Kee Boon Institute for Financial Economics

In a competitive landscape where money often has the final word, there is a pressing need for young adults to learn about taking control of their finances. Many will want to start planning a roadmap to financial success. This is where the program aims to help answer the million-dollar question: how to stay the course and build lifelong wealth?\n\nAll of the essentials are included in this world-ready program. These...

Making a budgeting plan is one thing. Sticking to it is another.

This course focuses on refreshing your budgeting knowledge acquired from school such as concepts, plans, identifying and classification of expenditures and more.

This course will also guide you on building a sustainable budgeting plan and share tips on how one can stick to the plan in the long r...
